title: Ted Baker Magnolia Stripe Dress, Navy
text:
Product information
An ultra-feminine classic for the wardrobe, this Magnolia Stripe dress from Ted Baker features vivid flowers in a luxurious floral print.
In a sleek pencil silhouette with a V-neck and belted waist, this dress is a flattering fit that's perfect for special occasions, weddings and evenings out. Complete with an exposed zip back fastening as a cool added detail. Pair with navy or bright stiletto heels for a statement look this season.

Ted Baker

title: Jacques Vert Lace Overlay Dress, Soft Pink
text:
Brand information
Established in 1972, Jacques Vert prides itself on elegant occasion wear, created exclusively with exquisite style in mind. Each design can be complimented with carefully co-ordinated accessories, offering the opportunity to shop for the ‘complete outfit’. Reaching out to a wide range of women and their fashion expectations, the pieces are available in sizes 8-24. Jacques Vert is the go-to shopping destination for the mature lady who wants to continue looking stylish whilst ensuring she looks and feels sophisticated and elegant.

title: Closet V-Back Frill Hem Dress, Multi
text:
Product information
Stand out from the crowd in this vibrant dress from Closet.
A chic way of incorporating florals into your new-season wardrobe, this dress is decorated with a stand-out flower pattern. It features feminine capped sleeves with a box pleated skirt and a frilly hem.
Team with a pair of high heels for a faultless ensemble.

title: Ghost Judy Trench Coat, Black
text:
Product information
Layer up in style with the Judy Trench Coat from Ghost.
Crafted from a luxurious satin fabric, this double-breasted style features long sleeves, a classic collar and full button fastening through the front.
Boasting twin patch pockets and finished with a removable belt to nip in the waist for a form-flattering silhouette. Drape over separates to complete your look.

text:
Product information
This stylish jacket from Bruce by Bruce Oldfield plays with proportion to effortlessly flatter the feminine silhouette.
Cropped in design, this monochromatic jacket is adorned in a contemporary geometric design and features elbow-length sleeves, a double breasted front opening and neat collar.
Layer it over the co-ordinating dress for a truly polished ensemble.

title: Tommy Hilfiger Jada Chambray Linen Blazer, Blue Heather
text:
Product information
A sophisticated choice for the spring/summer months, this Jada chambray blazer from Tommy Hilfiger can be thrown over any smart/casual separates.
Beautifully made from pure linen, this single-breasted design features front button closure, classic notched lapels, patch pockets at the waist, vertical darts and a branded emblem on the left sleeve.
Style with a scoop neck jersey tee, tailored trousers and heels for a chic day-to-night ensemble.

Team with cropped jeans and metallic heels for a super stylish daytime look.
